extendedInfo.description: Search for books, DVDs, audiobooks, CDs and more. The app provides quick access to your library account allowing you to place holds or renew items. Tabs listing library hours, our events calendar, new material lists and our Facebook page.Weâve also included a great new search feature called smart prefix search which makes everything searchable at the same time-no more search fields. Type the first few letters of multiple words: e.g. find Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis with just âja k onâ. Search results appear nearly instantly.The Abbott Public Library has invested in the latest mobile solution for libraries and we will be adding new content over time. We hope you enjoy it as much as we do!
